attributes.action: resign immediately, along with his Cabinet, to maintain the tradition of collective responsibility.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In more civilised times, if a government sensed that it was having the wrong effect with its policies and its actions, the executive would resign, like Eden. The time has come when the Blair government is now doing more harm than good to the United Kingdom, and should resign honourably, acknowledging its failures and apologising to the citizens that elected it.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
